courseName: Sales Force Certification Course in English
overview: Photoshop is a photo editing and raster graphic design software developed by Adobe Systems for both Windows and MacOS. It allows users to create, edit, and manipulate various graphics as well as digital art. Photoshop provides many image editing features for pixel-based images, raster graphics, and vector graphics

enroll: 3 Real-time projects + tons of live practicals
70+ hrs of study material, quizzes & manuals
Lifetime access of LMS with videos & material
learn: Have a complete and comprehensive knowledge of the tools inside Photoshop CC.
Learn to 'photoshop' your pictures, like an expert! You will learn how to take even the shabbiest looking drab photograph from your cellphone, and convert it into a head-turner.
Learn to retouch, heal and apply filters to photographs!
Become a full time graphic designer or a freelancer and get amazing gigs.
Learn Color Correction, Color Grading and several effects that you can apply to Photographs inside Photoshop.
Learn Creative styles to apply to photos; Make them look Jaw-dropping awesome!

why.title: Angular ranked second in “most used technology” in the Stack Overflow Survey
Developed, maintained, managed and monitored by Google Developers
Average base pay of an Angular Developers is more than INR 460,000 per year in India
The world’s most valuable resource is Big Data, no longer oil.
Rapid application development, Plays a role of front end in MEAN stack development

prerequisite.que: What to do before you begin your Sales Force online training?
prerequisite.suggest: Although if you’d like, you can brush up on your skills with our complementary HTML material right in your LMS.

curriculum.title: Photoshop basics
content: Place photos and graphics in your project
Use artboards in your photoshop workflow

curriculum.title: Understand layer panels
content: Using layer masks project: Photo Compositing Basics (Resizing and placing layers
Project solution: photo compositing basics (Resizing and placing layers)

curriculum.title: The selection tools
content: The magic wand and object selection tools
Improving edge selections with the refine edge tools
Easily remove objects from a photo with content aware fill

curriculum.title: Titles and text
content: Making text follow a linear or shape
Project: Design a poster with just text
Project solution: design a poster with just text

curriculum.title: Layer styles
content: How to add a line (Stroke) around your layers
Adding level and emboss to your layers

curriculum.title: Blend modes
content: Easily remove a black or white background with blend modes
How to create space inside a juice glass
Creating a camera flare with blend modes
Project: design a modern graphic with blend modes
Project solution: design a modern graphic with blend modes

curriculum.title: The filter gallery cc
content: Adjusting the strength of a filter

curriculum.title: Retouching photos in Photoshop
content: Intro to retouching and how to remove blemishes in Photoshop
Professional dodging and burning to enhance a portrait

curriculum.title: Editing raw photos with camera raw
content: Intro to editing with camera RAW
Effects like vignettes, grain and dehaze

curriculum.title: Adobe library
content: Speed up your workflow with the adobe library

curriculum.title: Saving and exporting
content: How to save your Photoshop project and export it for any purpose

curriculum.title: Full length projects
content: Intro to these additional project demonstrations

features.title: Lifetime access to course with support
Discussion forum for queries and interaction

forWho.que: Is this Sales Force Course for you?
forWho.ans:
Photoshop is a photo editing and raster graphic design software developed by Adobe Systems for both Windows and MacOS. It allows users to create, edit, and manipulate various graphics as well as digital art. Photoshop provides many image editing features for pixel-based images, raster graphics, and vector graphics So while anyone can benefit from a career in it, here are the kind of professionals who go for this Sales Force course:
  • Youtuber
  • Social media influencer
  • People who wants to work in a big production house
  • Any graduate focusing to build a career in photo editing

companies.title: Companies you can expect when you get Sales Force-certified with us

faq.que: How will I perform the Sales Force practicals at home?
faq.ans: For practice, manual and video for setup are available in LMS and you need to install it on your system at home.

faq.que: How long will the Sales Force course recordings be available?
faq.ans: All the Sales Force training sessions along with the complete Sales Force study material, POCs, and Sales Force projects will be available for lifetime.

faq.que: What things do I need to learn Sales Force through this course?
faq.ans: To attend this online Sales Force training, you just need a laptop or a PC with a minimum 4GB RAM. Nothing else is required to learn it.

faq.que: How do I clear my Sales Force related doubts?
faq.ans: You can post your queries on the discussion forum. Our support team will be happy to assist you.

faq.que: What are the system specifications required to learn Sales Force?
faq.ans: The recommendation is a minimum of an i3 processor, a 20 GB disk, and a 4 GB RAM for practicing Sales Force.

faq.que: How will this Sales Force course help me in getting a job?
faq.ans: Our Sales Force training includes multiple workshops, POCs, and projects. These will vigorously prepare you for Sales Force interviews so you can be confident in your work from day one. These things will help you get your dream Sales Force job in the industry.

faq.que: What will the end result be of this online Sales Force training course?
faq.ans: When you finish this course, you will be equipped with practical skills and theoretical knowledge the industry looks for. You will bloom into a certified Sales Force professional who is ready to take on Sales Force Projects in top organizations.

faq.que: Where do all the students come from?
faq.ans: We have a blend of students from across the globe. Apart from India, we provide training in the US, the UK, Singapore, Canada, UAE, France, Brazil, Ireland, Indonesia, Japan, Sri Lanka, and many others covering the globe.

faq.que: Is this Sales Force training classroom-based or online?
faq.ans: This training is completely online and self-paced.

faq.que: Will you be providing Sales Force certificate after the training?
faq.ans: Yes, you will be provided with an industry-recognizable certificate declaring your proficiency with Sales Force. At the end of this Sales Force course, you will work on real-time projects. Once you have successfully made it through the projects, you will be awarded Sales Force certificate.

faq.que: How do I get in touch with you for further queries?
faq.ans: You are  to contact us by placing a call at +91-8451097879 or by dropping a mail to info@data-flair.training

faq.que: What type of Sales Force projects will I be doing during the training?
faq.ans: You will be doing Sales Force real-life projects in different domains
This Sales Force course from us is 100% job-oriented and will prepare you completely for interviews from Sales Force job perspective.

faq.que: Can I attend a demo session before enrolling for this Sales Force?
faq.ans: Yes, you can attend the Sales Force demo class recording on this course page itself to understand the quality of training we provide. This is what creates the difference between us and other online Sales Force training providers.
